languages.text: "Пусть официальная политика Имперского флота касательно данного сектора отличается от сказанного вами, обещаю, что донесу ваши слова до моего командования".
"Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."
languages.original_text: "Пусть официальная политика Имперского флота касательно данного сектора отличается от сказанного вами, обещаю, что донесу ваши слова до моего командования".

traits.locale_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

traits.locale_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

languages.text: “尽管您的嘱咐与帝国海军的官方政策相悖，但我向您保证，我会向上级反应的。”
languages.original_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

traits.locale_text: “尽管您的嘱咐与帝国海军的官方政策相悖，但我向您保证，我会向上级反应的。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: 「陛下が仰った事は、帝国海軍の本部門に関しての正式な理念とは異なりますが、上層部に報告する事は約束します」
languages.original_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下が仰った事は、帝国海軍の本部門に関しての正式な理念とは異なりますが、上層部に報告する事は約束します」
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: «Aunque lo que ha dicho va en contra de la política oficial de la armada respecto a este sector, prometo transmitírselo a mis superiores».
languages.original_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque lo que ha dicho va en contra de la política oficial de la armada respecto a este sector, prometo transmitírselo a mis superiores».
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: "Eure Aussage widerspricht zwar der offiziellen Linie der imperialen Kriegsflotte, was diesen Sektor angeht, aber ich verspreche, ich gebe sie an meine Vorgesetzten weiter."
languages.original_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Aussage widerspricht zwar der offiziellen Linie der imperialen Kriegsflotte, was diesen Sektor angeht, aber ich verspreche, ich gebe sie an meine Vorgesetzten weiter."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: « Bien que vos propos soient en contradiction avec la politique officielle de la Marine Impériale concernant ce secteur, je vous promets de les transmettre à mes supérieurs. »
languages.original_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que vos propos soient en contradiction avec la politique officielle de la Marine Impériale concernant ce secteur, je vous promets de les transmettre à mes supérieurs. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: "Bu söyledikleriniz her ne kadar İmparatorluk Donanması'nın bu sektör hakkındaki resmî politikalarıyla çelişiyor da olsa bunları üstlerime ileteceğime söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Although what you said is at odds with the Imperial Navy's official policy regarding this sector, I promise I will relay this to my superiors."

traits.locale_text: "Bu söyledikleriniz her ne kadar İmparatorluk Donanması'nın bu sektör hakkındaki resmî politikalarıyla çelişiyor da olsa, bunları üstlerime ileteceğime söz veriyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor
